title: madhuraapuri kalyaaNi
sahitya:
madhurApuri kalyANi mAtanga tanayE

anupallavi

catuSkAma dAyini mrdu gajagamani madhura vAgvilAsini maNi vINA vAdani

caraNam


madhrApuri sOdari budhajana manOhari caturdaLa lOkEshvari vidukula pAvanakari
atulita suguNAkari vidhi suranuta shankari shrta bhakta pAlanakari satatam mAmava shrIkari
